user_id: Integer - Unique identifier for each user
account_balance: Float - Account balance in local currency
is_active: Boolean - Whether the user account is active
signup_date: Datetime - Timestamp of when the user signed up
profile_text: String - Free-text user profile or notes
email_address: String - Email address of the user
personal_website: String (URL) - Personal or business website of the user
contact_number: String (Phone Number) - User's contact number in international format
order_status: String (Enum) - Status of the most recent order (e.g., completed, pending, shipped)
rating: Integer - User rating (typically on a 1 to 5 scale)
currency_code: String - ISO currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, JPY)
postal_code: String or Float - Postal or ZIP code
notes: String - Additional notes about the customer
